description: Downloads attachments from Monday.com boards with parallel processing, group filtering, and status-based item selection. Supports automatic status updates after download.

capabilities.name: download_attachments
capabilities.description: Downloads all attachments from specified Monday.com board groups with parallel processing. Filters items by status (Retry or empty with today/yesterday date). Updates item status after download.

board_name.description: Name of the Monday.com board to process

groups.description: List of group names to process

group_folder_map.description: Mapping of group names to download folder paths

status_column_title.description: Title of the status column (default: Status)

date_column_title.description: Title of the date column for filtering (default: Date)

target_status.description: Status value to filter items by (default: Retry)

new_status.description: Status to set after successful download. MUST match an existing status label on your board exactly (default: In Queue)

error_status.description: Status to set when no PDF found. MUST match an existing status label on your board exactly (default: PO not FOUND  (ERROR))

capabilities.name: list_groups
capabilities.description: Lists all groups in a Monday.com board

capabilities.name: get_item_status
capabilities.description: Gets the current status of a specific item

item_id.description: ID of the item to check

capabilities.name: update_item_status
capabilities.description: Updates the status of a specific item

item_id.description: ID of the item to update

author: RPA Team
